original_text: A virtuous woman is a crown to her husband: but she that maketh ashamed is as rottenness in his bones.
korean_text: 어진 여인은 그 지아비의 면류관이나 욕을 끼치는 여인은 그 지아비의 뼈가 썩음 같게 하느니라

sentences.original_text: A virtuous woman is a crown to her husband
sentences.korean_translation: 현숙한 여자는 그 남편의 면류관이 되고

sentences.original_text: is as rottenness in his bones
